Home » 12S2 Nidānavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 6 Lābhasakkārasaṃyutta » 6.4 Catutthavagga
6.4.4 Sukkadhammasutta
Lābhasakkārasaṃyutta
Catutthavagga
Sukkadhammasutta
183.
1090Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. “Dāruṇo, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko. Lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūtassa pariyādiṇṇacittassa, bhikkhave, devadattassa sukko dhammo samucchedamagamā. Evaṃ dāruṇo kho, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko…pe…  sikkhitabban”ti.
1091Catutthaṃ.
